thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com
thread.title: WendyT

author: WendyT
title: WendyT
text: So many of the items included in the 2 for 24 deal are sold out. If the sold out items didn't show up when sorting on my size, that would be very helpful... but they do. Also, the membership deal with being charged $50 a month when you don't order anything is not a deal of any sort. It'd be better if this was spelled out on the checkout page instead of on a separate page you have to search for. This may end up leading to lawsuits for this company if they don't do a better job of showing it. I lIke the look of the leggings so I ordered them anyway. We will see when they arrive if they are worth the effort.
